titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St Mary le Bow before the Lord Mayor, Court of Aldermen, & citizens of London, on Wednesday the 18th of June, a day appointed by Their Majesties, for a solemn monthly fast by John Tillotson ...
titleStmt.author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Brabazon Aylmer ..., Will. Rogers ..., and J. Tillotson ...,

notesStmt.note: Half title: Dr. Tillotson's Fast-Sermon before the Lord Mayor, and Court of Aldermen, June 18th, 1690.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
